resources.string:
U.S. Navy Method:

There are many specific techniques used for measuring body fat. The calculator above uses a method involving equations developed at the Naval Health Research Center by Hodgdon and Beckett in 1984.

 Body fat percentage (BFP) formula for males:

SI, Metric Units:
 BFP = 495/(1.0324 - 0.19077ﾃ様og10(waist-neck) + 0.15456ﾃ様og10(height)) - 450

Body fat percentage (BFP) formula for females:

SI, Metric Units:
 BFP = 495/(1.29579 - 0.35004ﾃ様og10(waist+hip-neck) + 0.22100ﾃ様og10(height)) - 450
Please enter your height, weight,waist, neck and hip measurements.
Ask your healthcare provider about how to safely increase your body fat.
This is the body fat level that is often found in most elite athletes.
This body fat level is lower than most people and excellent for health.
This body fat level is generally acceptable for good health.
This body fat level indicates an excess accumulation of fat.
Ask your healthcare provider about how to safely decrease your body fat.
